content: When there is a mismatch in the id letter case between the fsh input file and whatever was left in the temp/qa folder from the last IG publish, the publisher fails. Would it be possible for sushi to pick this up during validation? Not super crucial, but it saves the profiler some time:)
it's really a publisher problem I've been meaning to get around to fixing for a long time. But you should probably turn off qa file production
Oh I see! How do I do that? (and while you're here... can I turn off production of other files as well? The xmls for example?)
Got it - is it the "suppress-qa" in the Control file?
